name: epiCRealism pureEvolution InPainting
description:
This is an inpainting model for the fantastic epiCRealism model, specifically version pure Evolution. It works remarkably well, both for inpainting and outpainting, can be used with pictures generated by any other model. Most importantly, the inpainting is very smooth and rarely shows any transition.

The author had already published an inpainting model, but that was based on version 1. pure Evolution is version 5. I updated the inpainting model by using v1 as a base, adding the differences from v5.

Differential mix formula:

model 1 (inpainting): epiCRealism v1-inpainting (mixing ratio 1.0)
model 2 (new): epiCRealism pure Evolution (mixing ratio 0.8)
model 3 (base): epiCRealism v1 (mixing ratio 0.2)
